title: Three people seriously hurt in knife attack in Vienna: Austrian media
text:
VIENNA (Reuters) - Three people were seriously injured in a knife attack in the Austrian capital Vienna on Wednesday evening, the Austrian Press Agency (APA) Quote: d a police spokesman as saying.
Mass-circulation daily newspaper Oesterreich said the stabbings occurred in the Leopoldstadt district near Viennaâ€™s famous Prater Park. News website heute.at said the victims were a man and two women aged between 40 and 50.
APA said police were searching for a lone assailant who had fled the scene, and that the motive for the attack was not known.
The police were not immediately available for comment.
Writing by Mark Heinrich; Editing by Andrew Heavens
